CustomField.description: BODEV-706: If the product is a user or storage and not part of the package, then the formula returns "Additional ..." value.
CustomField.formula: IF( AND( Opportunity.MM_Standardised_Package__c = True, (Part_of_a_package__c = False), (Purchase_family__c = "Storage Upgrade" || Purchase_family__c = "User Upgrade")), "Additional " & Name_rus__c, Name_rus__c)
CustomField.label: Product Name for the Flow
